title: Old gadgets aren’t just nostalgic. Sometimes they’re just better for you.
description: Despite near-constant new product releases, some people are finding real value in the tech time left behind.

title: After TikTok bill sails through House, Senators pump the brakes
description: Senators slowed a bill that would force a sale from ByteDance or ban of TikTok  — an effort that could close the app for millions of U.S. users.

title: Nvidia fever is here. Why the chipmaker is the world’s hottest stock.
description: Nvidia used to be a gaming company. Now it’s getting rich selling the picks and shovels of the AI gold rush.

title: Amazon violated workers’ rights at crucial air hub, labor regulators allege
description: Union organizers at a crucial Amazon air cargo hub in Kentucky won a victory last week when federal labor regulators found the e-commerce behemoth violated labor law by threatening and intimidating workers.

title: A year after imploding, Silicon Valley Bank tries to make a comeback
description: A run on the bank triggered the third-largest bank failure in U.S. history. Some techies are skeptical of putting their money back in.
